faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, Spain welcomes non-resident foreign property investment with transparent legal frameworks. EU citizens enjoy complete purchase freedom. Non-EU nationals navigate straightforward procedures requiring Spanish NIE (foreigner identification number) and bank account establishment. Professional legal guidance ensures compliance, but the process is well-established and internationally familiar. This property is equally accessible to UK, US, and international buyers.

faqs.question: Каковы расходы на покупку недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs typically include: transfer tax (6-10% depending on region and circumstances), notary fees (€800-€2,000), property registration (€500-€1,000), and optional legal representation (€1,500-€3,000). Total acquisition costs approximate 8-12% beyond stated property price. For this €579,000 penthouse, anticipate €46,000-€70,000 in acquisition expenses. Ongoing costs include annual property tax (IBI, typically €400-€800 annually) and community fees if applicable.
